mapper.select: select id, url, web_name, user_id, user_name, create_time, app_code, portal, type, dept_name from dmo_log.handle_log where id = #{id}
select id, url, web_name, user_id, user_name, create_time, app_code, portal, type, dept_name from dmo_log.handle_log limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into dmo_log.handle_log(url, web_name, user_id, user_name, create_time, app_code, portal, type, dept_name) values (#{url}, #{webName}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{createTime}, #{appCode}, #{portal}, #{type}, #{deptName})

insert into dmo_log.handle_log(url, web_name, user_id, user_name, create_time, app_code, portal, type, dept_name) values
(#{entity.url}, #{entity.webName}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.appCode}, #{entity.portal}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.deptName})

insert into dmo_log.handle_log(url, web_name, user_id, user_name, create_time, app_code, portal, type, dept_name) values
(#{entity.url}, #{entity.webName}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.appCode}, #{entity.portal}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.deptName})
on duplicate key update url = values(url) , web_name = values(web_name) , user_id = values(user_id) , user_name = values(user_name) , create_time = values(create_time) , app_code = values(app_code) , portal = values(portal) , type = values(type) , dept_name = values(dept_name)
mapper.update:
update dmo_log.handle_log
url = #{url},
web_name = #{webName},
user_id = #{userId},
user_name = #{userName},
create_time = #{createTime},
app_code = #{appCode},
portal = #{portal},
type = #{type},
dept_name = #{deptName},
where id = #{id}
